remarks: The ordering of two subspaces is determined by the atoms under them. ( ~ chrelat3 analog.)  (Contributed by NM, 29-Oct-2014.)
statement:
lssatle.s $e |- S = ( LSubSp ` W ) $.
lssatle.a $e |- A = ( LSAtoms ` W ) $.
lssatle.w $e |- ( ph -> W e. LMod ) $.
lssatle.t $e |- ( ph -> T e. S ) $.
lssatle.u $e |- ( ph -> U e. S ) $.
lssatle $p |- ( ph -> ( T C_ U <-> A. p e. A ( p C_ T -> p C_ U ) ) ) $.
$d A p $.
$d S p $.
$d T p $.
$d U p $.
$d W p $.
